name: Wormhole Machinery Operator
description:
Welcome, Operator #008

Your mission is to operate wormhole machinery to prevent spies (yellow aliens) from entering the teleport, but also keep the new employees alive (teal/green aliens). To play you only need a mouse (or finger and a touch device) - try to rotate the highlighted gears to manage the gates and platforms.

Early game prototype made in ~24hrs, thus the game consists only of four playable levels. If you encounter any game breaking bugs, please let me know.

Game made for Kenney Jam 2021 - Rotation -
https://itch.io/jam/kenney-jam-2021

Credits:
Programming - Konrad Nowakowski (me)
Graphics and Sound Effects - Kenney
Music - Children's March Theme by Cleyton Kauffman

Thanks for checking my game!
